title: WebRTC (Web Real-Time Communication)
subtext: Enabling real-time communication directly in web browsers
author: Buzzpy

description.title: WebRTC (Web Real-Time Communication)
texts: WebRTC (Web Real-Time Communication) is an open-source project that enables real-time communication between web browsers and mobile applications through simple APIs. It allows for direct peer-to-peer audio, video, and data sharing without the need for plugins or intermediary servers.

WebRTC is widely used in applications like video conferencing, file sharing, and live streaming, providing high-quality communication while minimizing latency. Its integration into all major browsers makes it a powerful tool for developers looking to build real-time communication features into web applications.
